bug.author: ZacBlanco
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: master/2.0.0-SNAPSHOT/2.0-preview Describe the bug Lots of locations in alluxio documentation still describe the use of alluxio.underfs.address when they should use alluxio.master.mount.table.root.ufs To Reproduce N/A Expected behavior N/A Urgency low Additional context This was related to the removal of in Issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/issues/8384>#8384</denchmark-link> (PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/pull/8548>#8548</denchmark-link> ). The property key was removed but references within the documentation were not. All references to should be removed from the codebase Locations (mostly under docs en/cn)
docs/.../Namespace-Management.md docs/.../Spark.md docs/.../Hive.md docs/.../master-configuration.csv docs/.../common-configuration.csv docs/_includes/*/underfs-address.md deploy/vagrant/provision/roles/alluxio/files/set_journal_folder.sh libexec/alluxio-config.sh intergation/docker/conf/alluxio-site.properties.template GetConfTest.java
This list is not all-inclusive but includes a majority of the locations
